de.unlixx.runpng.bitmap

Class Bitmap32Optimizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unlixx.runpng.bitmap.Bitmap32Optimizer

  • public class Bitmap32Optimizer
extends java.lang.Object
    Statically used Bitmap32Optimizer to create and to reconstruct delta frames. In case of optimize this class creates delta frames with reduced bitmap information. In case of deoptimze this class reconstructs the previously reduced frames. In addition this optimizer has methods to reduce color range for palette use.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      Little helper class to keep results from calculation.

    • Method Detail

      • optimize

        public static void optimize(Bitmap32Sequence sequence)
        This method starts the optimization of consecutive frames.
        Parameters:
        sequence - A Bitmap32Sequence object.
        See Also:
        APNG_Specification

      • optimize

        static Bitmap32 optimize(boolean bFirst,
                         Bitmap32 bitmapRef,
                         Bitmap32 bitmapDiff,
                         Bitmap32 bitmapNext)
        Internally used method to detect the delta between reference, difference and possible next frame.
        Parameters:
        bFirst - True, if it is the first frame (reference frame).
        bitmapRef - A Bitmap32 as reference frame.
        bitmapDiff - A Bitmap32 as difference frame.
        bitmapNext - The next Bitmap32 in the sequence for dispose op prediction.
        Returns:
        An optimized Bitmap32 with probably reduced size and reduced content.

      • applyRect

        static int[] applyRect(int[] anLower,
                       int nLowerWidth,
                       int nLowerHeight,
                       int[] anUpper,
                       int nUpperX,
                       int nUpperY,
                       int nUpperWidth,
                       int nUpperHeight,
                       int nBlendOp)
        Internally used method to try several dispose operations in order to get the smallest delta rectangle.
        Parameters:
        anLower - The lower pixel array.
        nLowerWidth - The width of the lower pixel array.
        nLowerHeight - The height of the lower pixel array.
        anUpper - The upper pixel array. May be null in some cases.
        nUpperX - The horizontal offset of the upper pixel array.
        nUpperY - The vertical offset of the upper pixel array.
        nUpperWidth - The width of the upper pixel array.
        nUpperHeight - The height of the upper pixel array.
        nBlendOp - Currently not used.
        Returns:
        A resulting pixel array in upper rectangle size and position.

      • calcDiffRect

        static Bitmap32Optimizer.DiffRect calcDiffRect(int[] anLower,
                                               int[] anUpper,
                                               int nWidth,
                                               int nHeight)
        Internally used method to calculate a difference rectangle from actual reference frame (lower with diff applied) and the next frame (upper)
        Parameters:
        anLower - The lower pixel array.
        anUpper - The upper pixel array.
        nWidth - The initial width.
        nHeight - The initial height.
        Returns:
        A DiffRect object with the results.

      • bufferDiffInPercent

        static double bufferDiffInPercent(int[] anRef,
                                  int[] anDiff)

      • optimizeColorType

        public static boolean optimizeColorType(Bitmap32Sequence sequence)
        Optimizes a Bitmap32Sequence for alternative color type if possible. This is an in-place operation and the given sequence should only be used for saving after.
        Parameters:
        sequence - A Bitmap32Sequence object.
        Returns:
        True, if the color type has been changed.

      • optimizeForPalette

        public static boolean optimizeForPalette(Bitmap32Sequence sequence)
        Optimizes a Bitmap32Sequence for color palette use. This is an in-place operation.
        Parameters:
        sequence - A Bitmap32Sequence object.
        Returns:
        True, if the bitmaps were changed. False, if there was no change needed.

      • deoptimize

        public static void deoptimize(Bitmap32Sequence sequence)
        Deoptimizes an optimized Bitmap32Sequence in order to reconstruct the original pictures.
        Parameters:
        sequence - A Bitmap32Sequence object.

      • apply

        static Bitmap32 apply(boolean bFirst,
                      Bitmap32 bitmapRef,
                      Bitmap32 bitmapDiff)
        Internally used method to recreate the delta frames.
        Parameters:
        bFirst - True, if it is the first frame (reference frame).
        bitmapRef - A Bitmap32 as reference frame.
        bitmapDiff - A Bitmap32 as difference frame (delta).
        Returns:
        A deoptimized and reconstructed Bitmap32.
